statements: SELECT * FROM student_grades ORDER BY student_id ASC, evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, assessment_name, grade FROM student_grades WHERE grade >= 80;
SELECT assessment_name, AVG(grade) AS avg_grade FROM student_grades GROUP BY assessment_name;
SELECT * FROM student_grades WHERE evaluation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT student_id, assessment_name, grade FROM student_grades ORDER BY grade DESC, assessment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_grades WHERE grade > 80 ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC, assessment_name ASC
SELECT student_id, MAX(grade) AS highest_grade FROM student_grades GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(student_id) > 2
SELECT assessment_name, AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM student_grades GROUP BY assessment_name
SELECT * FROM student_grades WHERE evaluation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT DISTINCT student_id FROM student_grades WHERE grade < 70 ORDER BY student_id ASC
SELECT * FROM StudentGrades WHERE grade >= 80;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM StudentGrades WHERE assessment_type = 'Midterm';
SELECT assessment_type, count(*) AS total_assessments FROM StudentGrades GROUP BY assessment_type;
SELECT * FROM StudentGrades ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, performance_score, performance_date FROM PerformanceData;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade, assessment_type, assessment_date FROM StudentGrades WHERE grade >= 90 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_id, performance_score, performance_date FROM PerformanceData WHERE performance_score >= 80 ORDER BY student_id, performance_date;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade, assessment_type FROM StudentGrades WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY grade DESC, student_id;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade, assessment_type FROM StudentGrades WHERE assessment_type = 'Midterm' ORDER BY student_id, assessment_date DESC;

SELECT student_id, course_id, grade, assessment_type FROM StudentGrades JOIN PerformanceData ON StudentGrades.student_id = PerformanceData.student_id WHERE grade >= 70 AND performance_score >= 70 ORDER BY student_id ASC, assessment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Students ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM Students WHERE birth_date > '2000-01-01';
SELECT subject_name, grade FROM Subject JOIN Grades ON Subject.subject_id = Grades.subject_id;
SELECT student_id, AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM Grades GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY average_grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Students WHERE birth_date > '2000-01-01';
SELECT subject_name, grade FROM Subject s JOIN Grades g ON s.subject_id = g.subject_id;
SELECT s.subject_name, g.grade FROM Subject s JOIN Grades g ON s.subject_id = g.subject_id ORDER BY g.grade DESC;
SELECT s.subject_name, AVG(g.grade) AS average_grade FROM Subject s JOIN Grades g ON s.subject_id = g.subject_id GROUP BY s.subject_name;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, grade_level FROM students ORDER BY grade_level DESC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, enrolled_date FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT subject, score FROM assessments WHERE score BETWEEN 80 AND 90;
SELECT * FROM evaluations JOIN performance_data ON evaluations.evaluation_id = performance_data.evaluation_id;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY last_name, first_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT s.first_name, s.last_name, a.subject, a.score FROM students s JOIN assessments a ON s.student_id = a.student_id WHERE a.score >= 90;
SELECT e.evaluator_id, e.feedback, p.performance_rating FROM evaluations e JOIN performance_data p ON e.evaluation_id = p.evaluation_id ORDER BY e.evaluator_id;

SELECT s.first_name, s.last_name, e.feedback, p.goals FROM students s JOIN assessments a ON s.student_id = a.student_id JOIN evaluations e ON a.assessment_id = e.assessment_id JOIN performance_data p ON e.evaluation_id = p.evaluation_id WHERE p.performance_rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM students WHERE age > 18;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, grade FROM students WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE score >= 90 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT student_id, subject, score FROM assessments JOIN evaluations ON assessments.student_id = evaluations.student_id WHERE assessments.score < 70;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM students WHERE age > 18;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, grade FROM students WHERE grade = 'A' ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT subject, score, date FROM assessments WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT class_name, teacher, location FROM classes WHERE teacher LIKE '%Smith%' OR teacher LIKE '%Johnson%';
